item.title: Reusing Old Smart bulbs
item.description: Intro Around five years ago I purchased some smart light bulbs. They are designed to be used with a smart hub, on of these. Turns out that the company behind this has made a new version of the hub, the miboxer, which is not backwards compatible with the older bulbs. It also requires an android account with rather dubious permission requirements to use. I’m not a fan of this kind of behaviour from companies and would rather reuse things where possible.
